formElement.label: Xen Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Xen.

formElement.label: VM Template:
formElement.documentation: Name of an existing Template in Xen.

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the virtual machine to be created.

formElement.label: Network Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the network to be used.

formElement.label: Provision Tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other provisions stored in the same location (default is $[jobStepId]).

formElement.label: Workspace:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander workspace the resource should use.
